summary:
This mod is Standalone follower mod.
Shoei is always at The Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FnyL126.jpg[/img]
This mod is Standalone follower mod.
Shoei is staying at [color=#98fb98]The Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun[/color].

He's not Essential. And you can get married with him.
His body looks change depending on body modification.

I would recommend use of follower overhaul mod like AFT or UFO, EFF.


If you can't find Shoei at The Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.
I'm afraid you should do Clean Install of Shoei.esp.
Don't worry. He will be waiting for you.



[color=#98fb98]His Profile[/color]
Favorite Food and Drink:
Ale
Baked Potatoes
Sashimi
Seared Slaughterfish

Type of Women:
Lady with charming eyes

Personality:
Passionate and sentimentalist



[color=#98fb98]Credit and Thanks[/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair by apachii[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30411]Brows by lthot[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3589]Natural Eyes by nevenbridge81[/url]


[color=#98fb98]Thanks[/color]
2ch キャラメイクスレ
照英
author: StandAlone01
